DOC.brief_summary: A trial, investigating the influence of injection speed and volume on the perception of subcutaneous injection pain.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating the Influence of Injection Speed and Volume on the Perception of Subcutaneous Injection Pain
DOC.criteria: Subject has signed the informed consent form prior to screening Age 1874 years at screening (both included) Known or suspected hypersensitivity to needle, ink ball pen or other that are in contact with the injection area during the clinical visit Previous participation in this trial. Participation is defined as having received at least one injection
